movie.title: Love Sarah
movie.description_intro: A young woman wishes to fulfill her mother's dream of opening her own bakery in Notting Hill, London. To do this, she enlists the help of an old friend and her grandma.
movie.description_full: A young woman wishes to fulfill her mother's dream of opening her own bakery in Notting Hill, London. To do this, she enlists the help of an old friend and her grandma.

movies.title: Date with a Kidnapper
movies.summary: A woman living in a boarding house is kidnapped by a small-time criminal. Soon others in the gang try to take her away from him so they can get the ransom.
movies.description_full: A woman living in a boarding house is kidnapped by a small-time criminal. Soon others in the gang try to take her away from him so they can get the ransom.
movies.synopsis: A woman living in a boarding house is kidnapped by a small-time criminal. Soon others in the gang try to take her away from him so they can get the ransom.

movies.title: Iron Man: Rise of Technovore
movies.summary: The young and insane tech genius Ezekiel Stane has developed a new techno-organic armor that seemingly outclasses Iron Man. When Stane unleashes a terrorist attack during the launch of Tony Stark's newest satellite, Iron Man is blamed. Now he must evade S.H.I.E.L.D.'s man hunt and find a way to clear his name.

movies.title: What They Had
movies.summary: Bridget returns home at her brother's urging to deal with her ailing mother and her father's reluctance to let go of their life together.
movies.description_full: Bridget returns home at her brother's urging to deal with her ailing mother and her father's reluctance to let go of their life together.
movies.synopsis: Bridget returns home at her brother's urging to deal with her ailing mother and her father's reluctance to let go of their life together.

movies.title: Lupin III: Legend of the Gold of Babylon
movies.title_english: Lupin III: Legend of the Gold of Babylon
movies.title_long: Lupin III: Legend of the Gold of Babylon (1985)
movies.summary: In New York City, several stone tablets have been unearthed that tell a tale about the Gold of Babylon. 2 Mafia families are after it as well as Lupin the 3rd himself. An old drunken woman named Rosetta appears to know much about this treasure than meets the eye. While Zenigata has made a group of female partners that'll lure Lupin into handcuffs. But the race is on for the gold of Babel. Who is this Rosetta woman? and what is the connection between New York and the Gold?
